about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about creating intelligent applications
about.description: With over 3 years as a software engineer, I've learned that the best products start from real user needs, not from technology constraints. Throughout my journey, I've always believed in putting users at the center—building solutions that truly matter in their daily lives. I don't want technology to be a barrier; instead, I want it to seamlessly enable better experiences. That's why I approach every project from need to implementation, ensuring we deliver genuine value. To achieve this holistic view, I've chosen not to limit myself to a single role. I continuously develop my skills across the entire software development lifecycle—from UI/UX design to frontend and backend—always striving to excel in every aspect so I can build products that truly make a difference.
